about_the_game:
FROM THE GROUND is a third-person multiplayer PVP shooter set in a cartoon world where fruits and vegetables have taken over the world. In this game, you play as one of 12 characters, also called "Juicers," along with other players in a variety of game modes.

Varied Environments

Fruits and vegetables are not just simple foods you harvest from a field, but living beings that now dominate the world. These quirky beings call themselves "Juicers," and they have only one thing in mind: fighting each other.
They clash in varied environments; farmlands, military bases, and undergrounds are part of their playground. Nothing can stops them.
Once they choose an area, the juice starts flowing !

Fruit Salad

Face off against other players in a free-for-all game mode where each elimination earns you a point.
The winner of the game is the player who reaches the maximum score limit or who has the highest score at the end of the allotted time.

Team Death Match

Face off against other players with your team until you have eliminated them all.
The winner of the game is the team that reaches the maximum score limit or who has the highest score at the end of the allotted time.

name: FROM THE GROUND

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 2500 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650 2gb or R7 350 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • Additional Notes: 900p medium settings 60fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel core i3 8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • Additional Notes: 1440p high settings 60 fps

short_description: FROM THE GROUND is a third-person PvP Multiplayer shooter. Play as juicy characters and face off yourself on the battlefield in a wacky universe.
